data.title: Ignacio Tapia (footballer, born 2004)
data.meta_description: Ignacio Tapia is an Argentine footballer currently playing as a attacking midfielder for Belgrano.
data.text:
Born in Primero de Mayo, Córdoba, Tapia started his career with Unión Empalme at the age of six, before moving to Belgrano a year later.[2] He also spent time with local sides Sociedad Cultural de La Para and Sportivo Belgrano de La Para.[3]

In November 2021, he signed a new three-year contract with Belgrano.[4]
